documentGreetingsContent.description: Welcome document text displayed on extension installation. When translating this one, please, translate only placeholders' content

WELCOME.content: Welcome to just another text editor, right inside your browser -

FEATURES.content: Enjoy its neat features, such as:

FEATURE_2.content: You can edit multiple documents - use controls at the bottom of the screen to navigate through them. Click on document's title to change it

BUGS.content: There may be bugs to encounter, since it is in early stage of development and is not block-based!

ENCOURAGEMENT.content: Use it just like a typical rich text editor!
